name: Revolting Cocks
description: '''Revolting Cocks''', also known as '''RevCo''', are an American-Belgian [[industrial rock]] band, and sometimes [[Supergroup (music)|supergroup]], that began as a musical side project for [[Richard Jonckheere|Richard 23]] of [[Front 242]], [[Luc van Acker]], and [[Al Jourgensen]] of [[Ministry (band)|Ministry]].
